When Reality Forger enters the battlefield, exile up to X target creatures until Reality Forger leaves the battlefield, where X is its power.
Reborn 2–{5}{W}{B}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
